review_data.title: Abzocke par excellence

review_data.title: Great food, really bad service
review_data.content: We reserved a table between 18.00 - 20.00 today. We arrived 18.02. We were ready to order soon after we arrived, but they didn't come to take our order until 18.30. The food was delivered 18.55. Normally service people apologise or come with a greeting...More

review_data.title: Ein super Essen zu einem fairen Preis
review_data.content: Super Service perfektes Essen was wünscht man sich mehr. Einfach nur ein tolles Restaurant, bei dem wirklich alles stimmt.

review_data.title: Beste Shawarma? Hier nicht.

review_data.title: Nice early dinner
review_data.content: Simple traditional food (we ordered the 7 mezze option) but very well done. Fresh and light. Crispy flavors from the ingredients. We will visit again.

review_data.title: Specialità della cucina libanese
review_data.content: Ristorante che offre specialità della cucina libanese. Ottimi i piatti base di carne (pollo e agnello). Servizio adeguato. Porzioni abbondanti...More

review_data.title: Excellent management consistency good quality
review_data.content: We ordered here numerous times takeaways as they didn’t have outdoors. Now they have outdoors you need enter the restaurant first We had various hot and cold starters taboulle;hummus; kibbe as well as wraps with beef rather than chicken. Definitely worth the waiting

review_data.title: Gutes essen beim Kaufleuten

review_data.title: Sehr, sehr feine und frische Küche
review_data.content: Sehr, sehr feine und frische Zubereitung der Speisen - sehr zu Empfehlen an Liebhaber von Libanesischen/arabischen Küche

review_data.title: Highly recommended. Will certainly go again.
review_data.content: Good Lebanese food. Very well located. Very friendly staff. A very good addition to the other two Le Cedre restaurants in Zürich.Well worth a visit. Shall certainly visit again, when we are next in Zürich.

review_data.title: unfreundlich und sehr teuer!

review_data.title: Überraschung

review_data.title: Essen okay, Service mit Luft nach oben
review_data.content: Leckeres Essen zu einem Preis der okay ist. Allerdings schade das einzelne Servicemitarbeiter die Gerichte nicht kennen/ erkennen.

review_data.title: Ein erfreuliches Erlebnis!

review_data.title: satisfied
review_data.content: same owners as other "cedre" restaurants in zurich the usual good "mezzeh" (assorted libanese specialities). most of the customers are libanese, meaning that real libanese food can be expected opening hours allow a late lunch on sunday (we started our lunch by 3 pm), difficult...More
